text: [Music]
imagine you want to find out which
animals live somewhere could be in a
pond or in a park but you can't see them
they're hiding one way you can find out
what lives there is by being a nature
detective and we could do that in lots
of different ways we can look for
Footprints or feathers but another way
is by looking for something called
environmental DNA so we all have DNA
inside us whether we a badger or a
person that DNA is like the instru ction
BG to make us and as animals live
somewhere they leave a bit behind in poo
or we or feathers for example we can
look for that identify what was there
and use that information to help make
happier homes for the Wildlife around us
[Music]
